ing: 4 (0.13 ounce) packages unsweetened strawberry-flavored drink mix powder
des: "I served this at my grandmother's 90th birthday and everyone wanted the recipe. Use any flavor of drink mix. One variation is to freeze the punch overnight and then set it out an hour before the event."
ins: In a large punch bowl combine drink mix, pineapple juice, sugar and water. Stir until dissolved. Stir in the ginger ale.
